segments.text: I can’t believe how careless the woman is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying dishes while water floods the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are taking advantage of her distraction, and it’s frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that stool any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just encouraging him, which makes it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining the floor, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside looks so peaceful, but inside is pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is making me anxious just watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR
